channel.title: Tristanlehot on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tristanlehot on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: UX Guidelines for modules developers
item.description: With more than 4000 modules available on PrestaShop Addons marketplace, the diversity of features developed by modules developers or by the PrestaShop team is growing faster every day, making PrestaShop one of the most adaptive and versatile e-commerce solution.

item.title: PrestaShop 2018 release schedule
item.description: Our release calendar for the next versions of PrestaShop 1.7 and 1.6.

item.title: PrestaShop loves its community
item.description: And here comes the nice surprise… 2018 is here, following the gregorian calendar, let us wish you a successful and happy new year again!

item.title: A look back on the PrestaShop project in 2016
item.description: Following up on both last Friday’s HNY post and last Monday’s lookback on the translation project, here’s an infographic presenting a few stats on the PrestaShop project, from GitHub and the Forge!

item.title: A look back on PrestaShop translation project in 2016
item.description: As we’re starting a new year, here is a visual look back on PrestaShop translation project and how it thrived thanks to the help of our translation community!
